T10D4202:168b-0: @168b ` // li yul lung bstan pa bzhugs so//
T10D4202:168b-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10D4202:168b-4: li yul byung nas li'i rgyal po rabs drug ni 'das /
T10D4202:168b-5: rabs bdun gyi rgyal po bi dza ya k'irti zhes bya ba'i tshe na /
T10D4202:168b-6: sang ka ya pra ha na ya'i gtsug lag khang
T10D4202:168b-7: dang nye ba'i lung pa sa ka ya byi ri
T10D4202:168b-9: sang gha bardha na zhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa zhig bzhugs te //
T10D4202:168b-10: de'i slob ma ban de zhig 'dul ba la slob ba las ban des tsandra garbha dang /
T10D4202:168b-11: 'dul ba'i dar ma sangs rgyas kyi lung mthong nas dgra bcom pa la zhus pa /
T10D4202:168b-14: aan se 'di gsum na sangs rgyas mya ngan las
T10D4202:168b-15: 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan
T10D4202:168b-16: dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams dus ji tsam zhig na nub /
T10D4202:168b-17: sus ni bshig / mthar ji ltar 'chi ba bshad cing lung bstan par gsol pa las /
T10D4202:168b-18: dgra bcom pas bka' stsal pa /
T10D4202:168b-19: 'di lta bu'i the tshom zhus pa ni dge'o //
T10D4202:168b-20: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T10D4202:168b-21: 'og tu chos kyi gzugs brnyan dang ring bsrel lo
T10D4202:168b-22: nyis stong du gnas nas nub par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:168b-27: hor la sogs pa dgra phal cher g-yos nas rtsod cing 'khrug par 'ong ste /
T10D4202:168b-28: de bas na sangs rgyas kyis chos nyams shing mchod
T10D4202:168b-29: rten yang phal cher re'u rul du 'gyur ba bshig
T10D4202:168b-30: cing zhig ste / dge 'dun gyi 'tsho pa'i yo byad kyang 'chad par 'ong ngo //
T10D4202:168b-31: yul 'di gsum la yang aan se dang /
T10D4202:168b-32: shul gi ni chos mi byed ba'i dgra mang pos dkrugs te /
T10D4202:168b-33: phal cher ni bsregs bshig ste stongs par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:168b-34: gtsug lag khang 'di rnams kyi ban de yang phal cher li yul du 'ong ngo //
T10D4202:169a-0: li yul gyi gtsug lag khang @169a * //
T10D4202:169a-1: dang mchod rten la sogs pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya bzhugs te /
T10D4202:169a-2: nyis brgya lnga bcu ni rab tu byung ba'i tshul du bzhugs /
T10D4202:169a-3: nyis brgya lnga bcu ni khyim pa'i nang du skye ba blangs te bzhugs /
T10D4202:169a-4: 'ge'u to shan gyi gtsug lag khang mi bskal pa
T10D4202:169a-5: bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa lnga'i zhabs kyis bcags
T10D4202:169a-6: shing rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i pho brang du
T10D4202:169a-7: 'gyur ro // 'phags pa 'di rnams kyi che ba dang /
T10D4202:169a-9: byin gyi rlabs kyis li yul gyi mchod rten dang /
T10D4202:169a-10: dam pa'i chos spyod pa dang /
T10D4202:169a-11: yang yul gzhan las rgyas shing yun ring du gnas so ;
T10D4202:169a-12: / rgyal po phal po che li yul 'dod pa'i phyir rtsod cing 'thabs te /
T10D4202:169a-13: gang gis thob pa'i rgyal po de yang li yul gyi yon bdag chen por 'gyur te /
T10D4202:169a-14: mi bshig mi 'bri bar byed cing mchod par 'ong ngo //
T10D4202:169a-15: de'i dus na gdong dmar gyi rgyal po zhes bya
T10D4202:169a-16: ba dbang thang dang mthu skyes nas yul khams gzhan
T10D4202:169a-18: de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyi rgyal po'i skye ba blangs te /
T10D4202:169a-19: bod khams su dam pa'i chos 'byung ngo //
T10D4202:169a-20: yul khams gzhan nas kyang chos kyi mkhan po dang /
T10D4202:169a-21: gsung rab mdo sde la sogs pa spyan drangs so //
T10D4202:169a-22: gdong dmar gyi yul du gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:169a-25: rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa dkor ril gyis dam pa'i chos la spyod /
T10D4202:169a-26: rgyal po gdong dmar de'i tshe li yul yang rgyal po de'i rigs su dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:169a-28: mchod rten la sogs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris mi 'bri /
T10D4202:169a-29: rgyas par btsugs shing mchod do //
T10D4202:169a-30: rgyal po gdong dmar gyi rgyud rabs bdun du dam pa'i chos spyod par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:169a-31: rgyal po 'di'i rabs bdun du yul khams gzhan na
T10D4202:169a-32: dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod rten bzhugs pa la ngan
T10D4202:169a-33: sems dang gnod pa mi byed do //
T10D4202:169a-34: de'i dus na li yul gyi dge 'dun yang tsan
T10D4202:169a-35: dra garbha'i lung bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin du
T10D4202:169a-36: dad pa bri / chos khrims dang mi ldan /
T10D4202:169a-37: 'jig rten gyi khe dang grags pa tshol /
T10D4202:169a-38: rgyal po dang blon po'i dku gtsang gi nang du
T10D4202:169b-0: 'jug cid dam pa'i chos dman par byed pa @169b
T10D4202:169b-3: zhang blon gyi bu tsha yang dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:169b-4: dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris kyang ban des spyad pas li yul gyi mchod rten dang /
T10D4202:169b-5: dam pa'i chos la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris kyang mngon pas 'brir 'ong ngo //
T10D4202:169b-7: blon po yang ban de de la mi dga'o //
T10D4202:169b-8: de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' cig gdong dmar
T10D4202:169b-9: gyi rgyal po byas pa'i rgyud rabs bdun gyi tha
T10D4202:169b-10: ma la rgyal po de'i chung ma rgya yul nas
T10D4202:169b-11: rgya rje'i bu mo kong co byang chub sems dpa'
T10D4202:169b-12: yin pa zhig 'khor drug brgya dang gdong dmar gyi
T10D4202:169b-14: kong co de 'phags par chos la dad dbang thang
T10D4202:169b-15: che bas gdong dmar gyi rgyal po yang dad pa
T10D4202:169b-16: che ste / sngon bas kyang dam pa'i chos rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:169b-17: de'i dus na li yul gyi rgyal po gzhon zhing
T10D4202:169b-18: chos mi spyod pa zhig gis li yul gyi dge
T10D4202:169b-20: yang na ni skye bor bo pas shig /
T10D4202:169b-21: yang na ni gar dga' bar dengs shig ces bskrad
T10D4202:169b-22: nas dge 'dun ril gyis tsar ma zhes bya ba'i
T10D4202:169b-23: lha khang du 'dus nas gros byed pa'i tshe /
T10D4202:169b-24: lha khang gi nang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil nas gser
T10D4202:169b-25: gyi zan dad gser gyi 'khur ba cha bdun byung
T10D4202:169b-26: nas dge slong lnga stong rgyal pos 'tsho ba bcad
T10D4202:169b-27: de / mi 'byor ba'i zla ba gsum du 'tsho ba'i zong du 'gyur /
T10D4202:169b-28: de'i tshe de'i dus na la la ni skye por babs /
T10D4202:169b-29: ma babs pa gung du 'gro ba rnams kyang pha ma dang /
T10D4202:169b-31: yul sa dang 'bral ba mi dga' ste /
T10D4202:169b-33: dge 'dun phal mang po lam du zhugs te //
T10D4202:169b-34: song ba las 'bong zhes bya ba'i lha khang du phyin pa dang /
T10D4202:169b-35: de na mchod rten chen po zhig bzhugs pa rlung gi rgyal po dad pa can gyis dral te /
T10D4202:169b-36: nang nas gser gyi phor pa mu tig gis bkang
T10D4202:169b-37: ba zhig byung nas dge 'dun spyi la phul lo
T10D4202:169b-38: // gzhan yon bdag dang pa can gyis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sna sna nas phul lo //
T10D4202:169b-39: de nas dge 'dun rnams mdo li me skar gyi yul du phyin te /
T10D4202:169b-40: mu tig gis zla ba phyed kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbyar ro //
T10D4202:169b-42: rkong nya zhes bya ba'i lha khang na dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i tshe bee shra ma na dang /
T10D4202:169b-43: dpal gyi lha mo mi khyo shug tu sprul nas yul de na 'dug ste /
T10D4202:170a-0: @170a * // dge 'dun thams cad la bdag cag bsod nams bgyid do zhes gsol nas //
T10D4202:170a-1: zla ba phyed kyi bar du dge 'dun la mchod
T10D4202:170a-2: ston gsol nas dpal gyi lha mos phu rung gang
T10D4202:170a-3: gi gser gyi dong rtse dge 'dun spyir phul te
T10D4202:170a-4: / dge 'dun ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du kha bltas te song ba las /
T10D4202:170a-5: yul pha shan gyi rong du gcan pa dang phrad de ma bkye'o //
T10D4202:170a-6: lam gzhan yod na song zhig ces zer to //
T10D4202:170a-7: de'i tshe bi shra ma na g-yag dkar po rgal
T10D4202:170a-8: ba can snal chu yod pa zhig tu sprul pa
T10D4202:170a-10: g-yag rgal can 'di ni mi'i phyugs yin pas 'di
T10D4202:170a-11: gar 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin du 'deng zhes zer ro
T10D4202:170a-12: // de'i tshe g-yag des nye lam du drangs te //
T10D4202:170a-13: zhag bzhi lngas ban de ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul tshal byi zhes bya bar phyin to //
T10D4202:170a-14: de'i tshe yul de'i dbang pos dge 'dun mang po
T10D4202:170a-15: zhig stod phyogs nas byon to zhes gdong dmar gyi
T10D4202:170a-17: de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mos rgyal po la stong
T10D4202:170a-18: phyogs nas dge 'dun yul stor te 'khyams nas byon
T10D4202:170a-19: pa sun ma dang yo byad bdag sbyor na /
T10D4202:170a-20: gdong dmar gyi yul du spyan drangs bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas gnang ste /
T10D4202:170a-21: dge 'dun rnams bzhon pa dang 'tsho bas bsu nas gdong dmar gyi yul du phyin to //
T10D4202:170a-22: de nas gdong dmar gyi rgyal po dang /
T10D4202:170a-23: kong co 'khor dang bcas pas mchod rten la phyag
T10D4202:170a-24: byas nas dge slong 'di'i nang na sde snod gsum
T10D4202:170a-25: la mkhas pa'i mkhan po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan
T10D4202:170a-26: 'di ltar mkhas pa bzhugs sam zhes dris pa dang
T10D4202:170a-27: / mkhan po na re aan se dang /
T10D4202:170a-30: kha che zhes bya ba'i yul na 'di 'dra bar
T10D4202:170a-31: mkhas pa'i dge 'dun mang du yod do zhes smras
T10D4202:170a-32: pa dang / de'i mod la 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang ste /
T10D4202:170a-33: dge 'dun ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du spyan drangs so //
T10D4202:170a-34: de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi yul du gtsug lag khang bdun brtsigs so //
T10D4202:170a-36: dkon mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris kyang sngon bas bskyed
T10D4202:170a-37: nas dge 'dun rnams kyang gtsug lag khang bdun gyi
T10D4202:170a-38: nang du so sor bzhugs so //
T10D4202:170a-39: de'i rjes la lo gsum mam bzhin na kong co'i
T10D4202:170a-40: snying gar 'brum chen byung nas na ba'i tshe kong
T10D4202:170a-41: chos rgyal po la gsol pa /
T10D4202:170b-0: bdag @170b ni nad 'di las mi 'tsho ste /
T10D4202:170b-1: nga 'gum na bdag gi bran dang /
T10D4202:170b-2: nor phyugs rnams dkon mchog gsum la mgum par 'bul lo zhes gsol te phul lo //
T10D4202:170b-3: 'khor drug brgya yang dge bsnyen gyi mtshan mas btab ste rab tu phyung ngo //
T10D4202:170b-4: de'i rjes la kong co 'das so //
T10D4202:170b-5: kong co 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal po gdong dmar
T10D4202:170b-6: gyi khams su 'brum nad 'byung ste blon po dang
T10D4202:170b-7: / zhang blon gyi bu tsha la sogs pa mang du 'chi'o //
T10D4202:170b-8: de'i tshe blon po rnams 'dus te rgyal po la gsol pa /
T10D4202:170b-9: sngon rgyal khams 'di na 'di 'dra ba'i 'brum nad ma byung na /
T10D4202:170b-10: nga ltar lto bal gyi dge slong 'khyams pa mang po 'ongs nas kong co yang 'das /
T10D4202:170b-11: blon po dang zhang blon las kyang mang du gum
T10D4202:170b-12: pas ban de 'di kun yang rgyal khams su mi
T10D4202:170b-13: gzhag par bskrad pa'i rigs zhes gsol ba las rgyal
T10D4202:170b-14: pos 'di bskrad pa'i rigs sam mi rigs da dung
T10D4202:170b-15: zhib tu dpyod cig ces bsgo ba las blon po
T10D4202:170b-16: rnams ban de bskrad par kha 'dus nas rgyal po
T10D4202:170b-17: la gsol te / rgyal khams su ban de ril
T10D4202:170b-18: gyis mi gnas par gros chad nas kun bskrad pa
T10D4202:170b-19: las gdong dmar gyi dge slong khros te /
T10D4202:170b-20: dge slong 'di rnams bskrad nas bdag cag kyang 'di na mi 'dug go zhes byas pa dang /
T10D4202:170b-21: blon po rnams khros nas khyed rnams kyang gang dga' bar dengs shig ces bsgo'o //
T10D4202:170b-22: kong co gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs pa'i 'og
T10D4202:170b-23: tu rgyal pos te'u shi'i chos bzung nas rgya'i dge
T10D4202:170b-24: slong yang ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs
T10D4202:170b-25: so // de'i dus na rgyal khams de'i dge slong gis gdong dmar gyi khams kyi ring bsrel dang /
T10D4202:170b-27: mchod pa'i yo byad dkon mchog gi mnga' ris gcig
T10D4202:170b-28: kyang ma lus par bkal nas nub phyogs su kha
T10D4202:170b-29: bltas te / gan dha ra chen po'i yul du 'gro bar chas te song ngo //
T10D4202:170b-33: li la sogs pa gangg'a tshun chad na dam pa'i chos spyod pa yang nub par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:170b-34: gangg'a'i pha rol na koo sh'amb'i'i yul du ni zla ba gsum zhig gnas te nub bo //
T10D4202:170b-35: gan dha ra'i yul gyi 'dab na klu'i rgyal po
T10D4202:170b-36: ae la pa tra'i gnas mtsho'i 'gram du dge 'dun
T10D4202:171a-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mtsho @171a * //
T10D4202:171a-1: yang rnyogs shing 'khrugs par gyur nas /
T10D4202:171a-2: klu'i rgyal pos nga'i gnas ci ste rnyogs shing 'khrugs snyam ste /
T10D4202:171a-3: 'phrul gyi mig gis bltas nas sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i gsung rab dang /
T10D4202:171a-4: dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ste /
T10D4202:171a-5: dge 'dun phal mo che mthong ba'i dus 'di yin par shes nas rgan po zhig tu sprul nas /
T10D4202:171a-6: mtsho'i 'gram du byung nas dge 'dun la phyag byas te dris pa /
T10D4202:171a-7: dge 'dun 'di snyed cig ga la byon /
T10D4202:171a-10: bdag cag rgyal po gdong dmar gyi yul na gnas pa las yon bdag dad pa bri /
T10D4202:171a-11: dkon mchog gi rten bshig pas bdag cag gan dha
T10D4202:171a-12: ra chen po'i yul du 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang
T10D4202:171a-13: / rgan pa na re dge 'dun 'di snyed cig la 'tsho ba ci mnga'/
T10D4202:171a-14: gan dha ra chen po'i yul du mtsho chen po
T10D4202:171a-15: 'di bskor nas 'gron zhag bzhi bcu'i lam yod do
T10D4202:171a-16: // dge 'dun la zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba las med na phyin tam zhes smras pa dang /
T10D4202:171a-17: dge 'dun phal cher smre zhing du ba klu'i rgyal pos mthong ste /
T10D4202:171a-18: klu'i rgyal po mi dga' nas gdung ba skyes te dge 'dun la smras pa /
T10D4202:171a-19: thad ka 'di na nye lam sbrul gyi zam pa zhig yod de /
T10D4202:171a-20: de'i steng du 'gro nus na myur du phyin zhes smras nas rgan po mi snang bar gyur to //
T10D4202:171a-21: de nas klu'i rgyal po des ri gar 'dzeg pa'i lam zhig snang bar byas /
T10D4202:171a-22: bdag dngos sprul chen po zhig tu sprul te /
T10D4202:171a-23: mtsho'i steng du zam par bcas nas dge 'dun phal
T10D4202:171a-24: cher bsgral nas sngon sdig pa byas pa'i las kyis
T10D4202:171a-25: da ltar byol song gi lus thob pa 'di yang
T10D4202:171a-27: smon lam btab nas sbrul gyi zam pa btsugs so //
T10D4202:171a-28: de'i tshe nyin zhag bco lnga mi phyugs rnams rgal
T10D4202:171a-29: ba las mi phyugs kha cig ni sprul gyi zam
T10D4202:171a-31: mi phyugs mang po rgyu ba'i tshe sprul gyi rgyab kyang la lar ni rdol /
T10D4202:171a-32: la lar ni ral te rnag khrag gi thigs pa
T10D4202:171a-33: char bzhin du zags pas mtsho yang khrag can du
T10D4202:171a-34: byas so // dge 'dun mang po sprul gyi zam
T10D4202:171a-35: pa rgal ba'i mjug kyang gdong dmar gyis bcad do
T10D4202:171a-36: byas so // // de'i rjes la sprul mtshor lhung ste /
T10D4202:171a-37: tshe 'das nas dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes so //
T10D4202:171a-39: de'i dus na dge 'dun rnams gandha ra'i rgyal po'i
T10D4202:171a-40: yul du lo gnyis kyi bar du 'tsho ba'i yo
T10D4202:171b-0: @171b byad sbyar / so sor ci bder gzhag go //
T10D4202:171b-1: lo gnyis lon pa dang rgyal po de tshe 'das so //
T10D4202:171b-2: rgyal po la bu gnyis yod pa gcig ni lha chos la dad /
T10D4202:171b-3: gcig ni mu stegs kyi chos spyod pas rgyal thabs
T10D4202:171b-4: la rtsod par gyur nas lha chos spyod pa'i non
T10D4202:171b-6: de rgyal nas rgyal thabs kyang des gzur ngo ;
T10D4202:171b-7: / rgyal po de'i tshe dge 'dun yang sngar bas dbang thang bskyed de /
T10D4202:171b-8: yo byad dang bde bar ldan par gyur nas lo phyed lon pa dang /
T10D4202:171b-9: ban de gcig gis rgyal po bsad nas rgyal srid
T10D4202:171b-10: pan des gzung bas gandha ra'i rgyal 'bangs ril log
T10D4202:171b-11: ste / ban de rgyal po byed pa de bsad do //
T10D4202:171b-12: ban de gzhan rnams kyang rgyal khams de na mi
T10D4202:171b-13: gnas par ril gyis bskrad nas gan dha ra'i yul
T10D4202:171b-15: de nas dge 'dun rnams kyang yul khams gzhan du 'khyams shing 'dong ngo //
T10D4202:171b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi rgyal po dang /
T10D4202:171b-17: byang phyogs kyi rgyal po yan pa la sogs pa sngar bas dbang thang bskyed de /
T10D4202:171b-18: rgyal po gsum mjal dum byas nas rgyal po 'di gsum gyis nub phyogs dang /
T10D4202:171b-19: byang phyogs kyi yul yang bzung /
T10D4202:171b-20: rgyal po de gsum gcig cing yang dmag 'bum dang chas te /
T10D4202:171b-21: koosh'amb'i'i yul du drangs pas koo sh'amb'i'i rgyal pos dam
T10D4202:171b-22: gsum 'bum rgyal po dang bcas te gcig kyang ma
T10D4202:171b-24: de nas koo sh'ambhi'i rgyal pos dmag mang po bsad
T10D4202:171b-25: pa'i sdig sbyang ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gi dge
T10D4202:171b-26: slong ril spyan drangs nas koo sh'amb'i'i yul du phyin
T10D4202:171b-27: pa'i rjes / dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig bsad de /
T10D4202:171b-28: 'dzam bu'i gling gi spyi'i lha chos kun der nub po /
T10D4202:171b-29: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /
T10D4202:171b-30: sa ya phrag drug na sangs rgyas byams pa mi
T10D4202:171b-31: mjed kyi 'jig rten du sems can gyi don la
T10D4202:171b-32: gshegs so // tsan dra gar bha'i lung bstan pa dang mthun no //
T10D4202:171b-33: 'phags pa'i mchod rten gom sa la gandha dang /
T10D4202:171b-34: glang mgo ri'i steng na sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i

T10D4202:171b-37: nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs nas 'gro ba
T10D4202:172a-0: mang po'i don du bla na med pa'i sangs @172a
T10D4202:172a-1: * // rgyas te bzhugs pa'i pho brangs spyir nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs pa la /
T10D4202:172a-2: li yul 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang nyi shu rtsa gcig pa lags te /
T10D4202:172a-3: bzhugs pa'i pho brang gzhan pas yon tan lhag par che /
T10D4202:172a-4: li yul ni gna' mtshor mchis pa'i dus na sangs
T10D4202:172a-5: rgyas sh'akya thub pas yul du 'gyur par lung bstan
T10D4202:172a-6: cing byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du byang chub sems
T10D4202:172a-8: lha klu sde brgyad la sogs te 'khor khri phrag nyi shu dang /
T10D4202:172a-9: bya rgod phung po'i ril bar snang las ldings te /
T10D4202:172a-10: li yul mtshor gyur par gshegs nas da ltar chu
T10D4202:172a-11: bo shel chab mgo ma'i 'gram na chab kyi steng
T10D4202:172a-13: mtsho 'di yul du 'gyur bar lung bstan byin gyis brlabs te /
T10D4202:172a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad 'khor nyi khri dang /
T10D4202:172a-15: mgon po srung ma brgyad 'khor sum khri lnga stong
T10D4202:172a-16: lnga brgya rtsa bdun rnams la 'phags pa'i mchod gnas
T10D4202:172a-17: 'di dang / yul srung bar bka' zhal gyis gtad de /
T10D4202:172a-20: rnam thos kyi bus snag gi ri dril te chab pho nas dogs dga' pa dang /
T10D4202:172a-21: sangs rgyas sngar padma'i gdan la bzhugs te /
T10D4202:172a-22: ri glang ru'i steng da ltar sh'akya thub pa'i sku
T10D4202:172a-23: gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i sar gdugs mtshan bdun gyi
T10D4202:172a-24: bar du ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol cing
T10D4202:172a-25: bzhugs nas slar rgya gar gyi yul yangs pa'i grong
T10D4202:172a-27: mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo brgya lon pa dang /
T10D4202:172a-28: li yul yang yul du gyur nas sngar yang sangs
T10D4202:172a-29: rgyas rgya mtsho'i steng na padmo la bzhugs pa'i thad
T10D4202:172a-30: kar da ltar go ma sa la gandha'i mchod rten
T10D4202:172a-31: bzhugs pa'i nang na shel ljang gu'i pho brang gi
T10D4202:172a-32: steng glang mgo tsandan las bgyis pa'i mchod rten gyi
T10D4202:172a-33: nang na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bzhi'i ring bsrel
T10D4202:172a-34: bzhugs te / la la gnas der phyin te mchod
T10D4202:172a-35: pa gces spras kyi mchod do cog thams cad lung
T10D4202:172a-36: bstan cing phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste
T10D4202:172a-37: bzhugs te / / gdugs tshan bdun gyi bar du
T10D4202:172a-38: bskor cing mchod pa bgyis na mtshams med pa lnga'i
T10D4202:172a-39: sdig pa 'byad par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T10D4202:172a-40: dngar ldan gyi grong khyer mkhar dge ba can gyi
T10D4202:172b-0: shar @172b phyogs na 'phags pa'i mchod gnas sangs rgyas
T10D4202:172b-1: kyis lung bstan zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i aadha ma'i
T10D4202:172b-2: mchod rten lcags thag can bzhugs pa yang mgon po
T10D4202:172b-3: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas rten /
T10D4202:172b-4: lha klu sde brgyad la sogs te srung ma rnams
T10D4202:172b-5: dus bzhi'i rab la 'du ba'i 'dus pa chen po
T10D4202:172b-7: yul gyi dpon sna rnams kyis gna' mchod rten 'di
T10D4202:172b-8: srid pa tshun chad deng sang gi bar du dus
T10D4202:172b-9: bzhi'i rab la nar mar mchod pa che thang du
T10D4202:172b-10: bgyid / gzhung las kyang li yul du mi ngas
T10D4202:172b-11: dang phyi dgra la sogs te ma legs pa byung
T10D4202:172b-12: ba'i dus su theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'dus
T10D4202:172b-14: dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i mdo sde bklags na
T10D4202:172b-15: g-yul zhi bar 'gyur zhes 'byung bas gzhung la brten
T10D4202:172b-16: te lugs su stsal nas deng sang gi bar du
T10D4202:172b-17: dgung lo gcig bzhin dpyid dang /
T10D4202:172b-19: ston 'u then gyi dge 'dun bzhugs so //
T10D4202:172b-20: 'tshal gyi dgung bdun gyi bar gong du smos pa'i
T10D4202:172b-21: mdo sde la sogs pa klog cing thugs dam bskul
T10D4202:172b-22: ba dang / bsngo bcol rgya cher bgyid /
T10D4202:172b-23: mchod rten chen po brgyad la yul ser skya'i grong
T10D4202:172b-24: khyer lum pa'i tshal du mchod rten chen po gcig
T10D4202:172b-25: / yul ma gadh'a rgyal po'i khab chu bo nee
T10D4202:172b-26: ra nydza na'i 'gram rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par
T10D4202:172b-27: byang chub pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig yul
T10D4202:172b-28: ma gadh'ar rgyal po'i khab tu bdud kyi dmag 'bum
T10D4202:172b-29: phrag bco brgyad btul ba'i sar mchod rten chen po
T10D4202:172b-30: gcig sangs rgyas mngon par byang chub nas gdugs tshan
T10D4202:172b-31: bdun gyi bar du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa
T10D4202:172b-32: dang / tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
T10D4202:172b-33: gsol ba btab pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig
T10D4202:172b-34: / yul k'a shi b'a r'a na s'i'i grong khyer
T10D4202:172b-35: gyi drung na ri dags kyi tshal du chos kyi
T10D4202:172b-36: 'khor lo bskor ba'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig
T10D4202:172b-37: / yul ko sa la mnyam du yod pa'i grong
T10D4202:172b-38: khyer du mar bdud sde dgu bcu rtsa drug pham
T10D4202:172b-39: par mdzad nas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i sar
T10D4202:172b-40: mchod rten chen po gcig / yul ba sang sang
T10D4202:172b-41: ga sha'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa
T10D4202:172b-42: gsum gyi lha yul nas gshegs pa'i sar mchod rten
T10D4202:172b-43: chen po gcig / gyang yul rtsa mchog gi grong
T10D4202:172b-44: khyer shing s'a la zung gi 'og tu mya ngan
T10D4202:173a-0: dang / @173a * // lo rgyus dang / gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:173a-1: dge 'dun sde gnyis kyi grangs ni gna' thog ma
T10D4202:173a-2: sangs rgyas 'od srungs 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe
T10D4202:173a-3: li yul yang de tsam na yul du gyur te
T10D4202:173a-4: / de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang chos bgyid /
T10D4202:173a-5: slad kyi sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi chos bstan pa gzhag pa nub pa'i tshe /
T10D4202:173a-6: li yul gyi chos kyang zhig nas drang srong khar shva dang /
T10D4202:173a-7: kha re'u steng zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa drang
T10D4202:173a-8: srong mang po'i yul mi ring ba zhig tu li
T10D4202:173a-9: yul phyogs kyi ri rtsa dag na gnas te /
T10D4202:173a-10: des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid bgyid pa las
T10D4202:173a-11: slad kyi drang srong de rnams la mi ngan kha
T10D4202:173a-12: cig gis gtses nas rngan can bgyis /
T10D4202:173a-13: bkur sti dang rim gro ma bgyis pas dang srong
T10D4202:173a-14: de rnams kyang mi dga' nas li yul spangs te
T10D4202:173a-15: / nam mkha' la ldings nas yul gzhan du mchis /
T10D4202:173a-16: de nas ni li yul gyi mi rnams kyang chos
T10D4202:173a-17: la ma dad de lta ba logs par gyur te
T10D4202:173a-18: / klu rnams mi dga' ste chab byung nas li yul yang mtshor gyur to //
T10D4202:173a-19: yun ring mo zhig tu mtshor mchis mchis pa las
T10D4202:173a-20: slad kyi yangs sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa rgya gar
T10D4202:173a-22: sems can gyi don mdzad cing chos kyi 'khor lo
T10D4202:173a-23: bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
T10D4202:173a-24: su mdzad pa rnams mdzad nas mya ngan las 'da'
T10D4202:173a-25: bar bstan pa nye ba zhig gi dus na /
T10D4202:173a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa rgyal po'i
T10D4202:173a-27: khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te zla
T10D4202:173a-28: ba'i snying po gsungs pa'i tshe yul khams so so'i
T10D4202:173a-29: mgon po dang / lha klu la sogs pa srung
T10D4202:173b-0: ma rnams la gtad pa'i @173b dus na li yul
T10D4202:173b-3: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la sogs yang dag shes dang /
T10D4202:173b-4: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
T10D4202:173b-5: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
T10D4202:173b-6: lha'i bu mo blo rab brten dang /
T10D4202:173b-7: lha mo 'phrog ma la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas
T10D4202:173b-8: pa la gtad nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang 'khor
T10D4202:173b-9: rnam bzhi 'bum phrag du ma dang nam mkha' la
T10D4202:173b-10: ldings nas li yul du gshegs te /
T10D4202:173b-11: da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen po bzhugs
T10D4202:173b-12: pa'i thad kar mtsho'i steng du ta la bdun srid
T10D4202:173b-13: tsam gyi gnam 'phang gi nam mkha' la padma'i gdan
T10D4202:173b-14: la bzhugs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so
T10D4202:173b-15: so nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis li yul
T10D4202:173b-16: byin gyis brlabs pa'i slad du bskul ba'i 'od zer
T10D4202:173b-18: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T10D4202:173b-19: cad kyis kyang li yul byin gyis brlab pa'i slad
T10D4202:173b-20: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas sangs rgyas
T10D4202:173b-21: sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i byang chub
T10D4202:173b-22: sems dpa'i 'khor dang yul 'khor bsrung zhing byin gyis
T10D4202:173b-23: brlab pa'i sngags kyi snying po dang /
T10D4202:173b-24: 'od zer btang nas dus gcig tu sangs rgyas sh'akya
T10D4202:173b-25: thub pa'i spyi gtsug tu 'dus par byin gyis brlabs
T10D4202:173b-26: nas dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung ngo
T10D4202:173b-27: // de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas kyang
T10D4202:173b-28: li yul mtshor gyur pa 'od zer gyis khyab par
T10D4202:173b-29: mdzad nas 'od zer de dag las chu'i khar padma
T10D4202:173b-30: sum brgya drug cu rtsa gsum byung /
T10D4202:173b-31: padma re re'i khar yang me mar kha re re
T10D4202:173b-32: byung de nas 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus
T10D4202:173b-33: nas chab kyi steng du g-yas phyogs su lan gsum
T10D4202:173b-34: bskor nas chu'i dkyil du nub par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:173b-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T10D4202:173b-36: rnam thos kyi sras la bka' stsal pa /
T10D4202:173b-37: khyed kyis mam sa bar na barba ta zhes bya
T10D4202:173b-38: ba'i ri snag gi kha dog 'dra ba'i mtsho 'di
T10D4202:173b-39: drol zhig ces bka' stsal nas /
T10D4202:173b-40: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gseg shang gi rtsa ba dang /
T10D4202:173b-41: rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses mtsho dral nas /
T10D4202:173b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyang glang mgo'i ri steng na sku
T10D4202:173b-43: gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i g-yon logs kyi lha khang
T10D4202:174a-1: nad ltar mchod rten chung du zhig bzhugs pa'i sar
T10D4202:174a-2: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i slad du gdung bdun
T10D4202:174a-4: de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
T10D4202:174a-9: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di rnams gcig
T10D4202:174a-10: tu 'dus nas g-yas logs su lan gsum bskor te
T10D4202:174a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T10D4202:174a-13: sh'a ri'i bus gseg shang gi rtsa ba dang /
T10D4202:174a-14: rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses mtsho dral bas phyis
T10D4202:174a-15: 'tsho bskams nas nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og
T10D4202:174a-16: tu yul li yul zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ste
T10D4202:174a-17: / 'od zer lan gsum 'khor ba'i sar ni khor
T10D4202:174a-18: khor yug tu phyis 'u then gyis mkhar lnga ldan
T10D4202:174a-19: gyi grong khyer chen po brtsig par 'gyur ro //
T10D4202:174a-20: chu'i dkyil du 'od zer nub pa'i sar ni yul
T10D4202:174a-21: byin gyis rlob cing srung ba'i r'a dza gra ma'i
T10D4202:174a-22: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ngas tsandan gyi nang du
T10D4202:174a-23: sku'i grib ma nub par byin gyis brlabs te byas
T10D4202:174a-24: pa zhig rgya gar yul nas nam mkha' las gshegs
T10D4202:174a-26: chu'i nang na padmo dang me mar byung ba'i sar
T10D4202:174a-27: ni phyis theg pa chen po spyod pa'i dge slong
T10D4202:174a-28: pho mo gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po sum
T10D4202:174a-29: brgya drug cu rtsa gsum rgyal po la sogs pa
T10D4202:174a-30: yon bdag dad pa can rnams kyis brtsigs nas de
T10D4202:174a-31: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byed pa'i
T10D4202:174a-32: byang chub sems dpa'i dge slong pho mo'i tshul dug
T10D4202:174a-33: nas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu dang khyim pa skye
T10D4202:174a-34: bo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste
T10D4202:174a-35: lnga brgya rtag tu nags so //
T10D4202:174a-36: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i la ngas pa'i byang
T10D4202:174a-37: chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i chos la rgyas
T10D4202:174a-38: par spyod pa la phal cher gnas te /
T10D4202:174a-39: 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T10D4202:174a-40: zhing khud pa yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa'
T10D4202:174a-41: 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang /
T10D4202:174a-43: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /
T10D4202:174a-44: rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
T10D4202:174b-0: gzhon nu @174b rdo rje lam dral dang /
T10D4202:174b-1: lha klu la sogs pa la dus thams cad du srungs shig par de bzhin gshegs pas gtad do //
T10D4202:174b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /
T10D4202:174b-4: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
T10D4202:174b-9: sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T10D4202:174b-10: rnam thos kyis ras 'khor gnod sbyin sum stong dang /
T10D4202:174b-11: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes 'khor khri phrag bcu dang /
T10D4202:174b-12: lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'khro stong dang /
T10D4202:174b-13: nam mkha'i spyan 'khor brgyad stong dang ;
T10D4202:174b-14: lha'i bu gser phreng 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T10D4202:174b-15: klu'i rgyal po gnas dros po 'khor stong dang /
T10D4202:174b-16: lha mo lcags kyu can 'khor stong phrag bcu dang /
T10D4202:174b-17: lha mo gnas ldan ma 'khor lnga stong dang /
T10D4202:174b-18: rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
T10D4202:174b-19: gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang /
T10D4202:174b-20: lha'i bu blo rab brtan dang /
T10D4202:174b-21: lha mo 'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs
T10D4202:174b-22: pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshig bcas
T10D4202:174b-23: nas li yul bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes te /
T10D4202:174b-24: deng sang gi bar du yang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgyad dang /
T10D4202:174b-25: rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa'i mgon po dang /
T10D4202:174b-28: lha mo rnams thog ma sangs rgyas goo to shan
T10D4202:174b-29: du gshegs te 'khor mang pos bskor nas bzhugs pa'i
T10D4202:174b-30: tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang /
T10D4202:174b-31: mgon po dang lha klu rnams gal bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gnas dang /
T10D4202:174b-32: dam tshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul srung zhing byin gyis rlob /
T10D4202:174b-33: mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang /
T10D4202:174b-35: de nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung
T10D4202:174b-36: lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og
T10D4202:174b-37: tu rgya gar gyi rgyal po dharma aa sho ka
T10D4202:174b-38: zhes bgyi ba zhig gis sngon sems can mang po
T10D4202:174b-39: zhig bkum pa las slad kyi 'phags pa dgra bcom
T10D4202:174b-40: pa ya sho zhes bgyi ba zhig gis dge ba'i
T10D4202:174b-42: sngar sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags /
T10D4202:174b-43: slad kyis mi bgyi bar yang yi dam bcas /
T10D4202:174b-44: 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:174b-45: mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams su mchod pa bgyid cing /
T10D4202:175a-1: byin can gnyen po byin gyis brlabs pa mchis so 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:175a-2: mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong brtsig tu mchis pa
T10D4202:175a-3: las mtsho ba skams nas li yul yang stong du
T10D4202:175a-4: mchis pa'i tshe / da ltar 'u then gyi sku
T10D4202:175a-5: mkhar mchis ba'i dog sar kus po yin du shul
T10D4202:175a-6: phyung nas dro dgongs shig btab pa'i nub mo rgyal
T10D4202:175a-7: po'i btsun mo dam pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan
T10D4202:175a-8: pa bzang po zhig btsas nas /
T10D4202:175a-9: sngon rgyal po'i btsun mos de kun dga' ra ba'i skyed mos tshal du mchis pa las /
T10D4202:175a-10: rdzing bu'i nang du khrus bgyid cing mchis pa'i dus
T10D4202:175a-11: na rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'
T10D4202:175a-13: rgyal po'i btsun mos kyang rnam thos sras kyi sras
T10D4202:175a-14: byad bzhin bzang po mthong bas sems kyi bur chags
T10D4202:175a-15: pas kus po yin du btsas nas /
T10D4202:175a-16: rgyal po dharma aa sho kas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste /
T10D4202:175a-19: dbang thad ci yod ces brtags na /
T10D4202:175a-20: ltas mkhan rnams kyi mchid nas bu 'di mchan ma yang bzang /
T10D4202:175a-21: dbang thang yang rab tu che ste /
T10D4202:175a-22: mi tha mal pa ma lags pas rgyal po yab
T10D4202:175a-23: sku tshe ma 'phos bar rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur
T10D4202:175a-25: rgyal po dharma aa sho ka phrag dog skyes te khros nas /
T10D4202:175a-26: kho de ltar dbang thang che na kho bdag 'tsho zhing srid 'dzin grang /
T10D4202:175a-27: 'di nga la mi dgos kyis bor cig ces mchis nas /
T10D4202:175a-28: mas kyang bu 'di mi bor du ni rgyal po
T10D4202:175a-29: khro zhing drag shul che bas bu bkum du dogs
T10D4202:175a-30: nas mas bu de bor ba las slad kyis sa
T10D4202:175a-31: las nu ma byung nas de 'tshal ba las ma
T10D4202:175a-32: gum nas ming yang phyis sa nur btags so //
T10D4202:175a-33: de'i rjes la rgya rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang ba cig byung ste /
T10D4202:175a-34: de la bu dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu ni mchis na /
T10D4202:175a-35: stong du bu gcig gis ma tshang bas rnam thos
T10D4202:175a-36: kyi sras la gsol ba btab ste bslangs pa las
T10D4202:175a-37: rnam thos kyi sras kyis bltas pa na khye'u sa
T10D4202:175a-38: nu bsod nams can por ba mthong nas blangs te
T10D4202:175a-39: rgya rje'i bu skal du stsal ;
T10D4202:175a-40: de nas rgya rjes bu de gsos nas slad kyi
T10D4202:175a-41: khye'u chen por skyes nas rgya'i bu sbun dar byis
T10D4202:175a-42: pa rtse rtse ba las 'thabs nas khyod rgya rje'i
T10D4202:175a-43: bu ma yin no zhes bgyis pa dang /
T10D4202:175a-44: khye'u de glo ba mi dga' nas mi gzhan dag
T10D4202:175a-45: la yang lo rgyus smras nas yang de ltar gyur
T10D4202:175b-0: nas rgya rje la bdag thog ma skyes pa'i @175b
T10D4202:175b-1: yul tshol / sa tshol du mchi bar ci gnang zhes gsol ba las /
T10D4202:175b-2: rgya rje'i zhal nas khyod nga'i bu yin te /
T10D4202:175b-3: yul sa yang 'di yin mi dga' ma byed cig
T10D4202:175b-4: ces lan du ma bsgo ba las ma nyan nas
T10D4202:175b-5: rgya rjes rgyal bu sa nu rgyal po'i thabs stsal
T10D4202:175b-6: te / dmag stong phrag bcu dang bsgrags te nub phyogs su yul tshol /
T10D4202:175b-7: sa tshol du btang ba las li yul gyi me skar du phyin te /
T10D4202:175b-8: de nas mchis pa la rgya gar yul nas kyang
T10D4202:175b-9: rgyal po dharma aa sho ka'i blon po ya sha
T10D4202:175b-10: zhes bgyi pa la dku dar nas /
T10D4202:175b-11: blon po ya sha spad spun rje khol 'khor yan
T10D4202:175b-12: chad rgyal po la mi dga' ba bdun stong yul
T10D4202:175b-13: nas byung ste / nub phyogs shar phyogs su yul tshol sa tshol du mchis mchis pa las /
T10D4202:175b-14: 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul phyogs su
T10D4202:175b-15: mchis pa dang rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor gyi tshong
T10D4202:175b-17: zod bgyi ba gnyis la ba sbrum ma thun mong ba cig mchis pa las //
T10D4202:175b-18: ba bu nad langs nas me skar nas zhugs ngams thang kar brtol te to lar bros pa las /
T10D4202:175b-19: mi de gnyis kyis rjes bzhin du bdas pa las to lar slebs te /
T10D4202:175b-20: ba be'u 'brangs pa las yul de'i ming yang be'u 'brangs pa'i sa 'bru so lo nya zhes btags /
T10D4202:175b-21: to la'i zhugs dams kyi ming yang li skad du
T10D4202:175b-22: sher bzang zhes btags te de nas mi gnyis kyis
T10D4202:175b-23: bltas nas / yul ljongs stong pa bzang po zhig
T10D4202:175b-24: gda' nas 'di bdag cag gi rgyal bu sa nu'i
T10D4202:175b-25: yul sar rung ngo zhes mchid gros su 'tshal nas
T10D4202:175b-26: yul sa de lta zhig mchis mchis pa dang /
T10D4202:175b-27: 'u then gyi shel chab gong mar mchis pa dang /
T10D4202:175b-28: blon po ya sha'i 'khro dang mjal nas khyed su'i mi /
T10D4202:175b-29: ga las mchis zhes smras pa dang /
T10D4202:175b-30: mi de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu sa nu'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang /
T10D4202:175b-31: ya shas kyang rgyal bu sa nu me skar na
T10D4202:175b-32: mchis pa'i steng du pho nyas 'phrin pa las khyod
T10D4202:175b-33: ni rgyal rigs / bdag ni blon po'i rigs na /
T10D4202:175b-35: khyod kyis ni rgyal po byas /
T10D4202:175b-36: bdag gis blon po byas te'u then gyi ljongs 'dir yul sar btsugs na rung ngo zhes mchi na /
T10D4202:175b-37: de nas rgyal bu sa nu yang 'khor dang bcas
T10D4202:175b-38: te 'u then gyi shel chu ngo mar mchis nas
T10D4202:175b-39: tshar 'di nya'i 'og yul hang gu dzo zhes bgyi
T10D4202:175b-40: bar mjal te / rgyal bu dang blon po ya sha gnyis yul sa la ma dum ste /
T10D4202:176a-0: dmag bkye ste 'thabs pa las nam mkha' @176a * //
T10D4202:176a-1: las rnam thos kyi sras dang /
T10D4202:176a-2: dpal gyi lha mo byung nas bshug te /
T10D4202:176a-4: dog sa de nyid du rnam thos kyi sras dang /
T10D4202:176a-5: dpal gyi lha mo bzhugs pa'i steng khang re re
T10D4202:176a-6: zhig brtsigs pa yang deng sang gi bar du mchis
T10D4202:176a-7: te / yul gyi srung mar gtso bo rnam thos kyi sras dang /
T10D4202:176a-8: dpal gyi lha mo mchod pa yang de lags /
T10D4202:176a-9: de nas rgyal bu sa nu dang /
T10D4202:176a-10: blon po ya sha yang dum nas sa nus ni rgyal po bgyis /
T10D4202:176a-11: ya shas ni blon po bgyis nas rgyal po sa
T10D4202:176a-12: nu'i 'khor rgya rnams ni'u than gyi shel chu 'og
T10D4202:176a-13: ma man chad mdo lo skor dang /
T10D4202:176a-14: skam sheng yan chad du bkod /
T10D4202:176a-15: blon po ya sha'i 'khor rgya gar rnams ni shel chu gong ma yan chad rgya dang /
T10D4202:176a-16: kong sheng man chad du bkod /
T10D4202:176a-17: shel chu dbus ni rgya gar dang /
T10D4202:176a-19: 'bangs stod rims 'dres par bkod nas yul btsugs mkhar brtsigs te /
T10D4202:176a-20: rgya gar dang rgya phrad pa'i yul ni li lags te /
T10D4202:176a-21: 'phral skad ni rgya gar dang rgyar mi mthun pa /
T10D4202:176a-22: yi ge ni rgya gar dang bags kyis mthun /
T10D4202:176a-23: 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher mthun /
T10D4202:176a-24: chos kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgya gar dang phal cher mthun /
T10D4202:176a-25: li'i 'phral skad ni thog ma byang chub sems dpa'
T10D4202:176a-26: 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du
T10D4202:176a-27: sprul te / mtshan bee ro tsa na zhes bgyi bas byis pa phyugs rdzi khye'u 'jos dang /
T10D4202:176a-28: mu le 'ji zhes bgyi ba gnyis la sogs pa
T10D4202:176a-29: la yul tsar ma zhes bgyi bar li skad phyung
T10D4202:176a-31: khye'u de gnyis kyang gar mchis pa'i cha su la yang ma mchis te /
T10D4202:176a-32: 'di skad kyang thog ma 'phags pa rnams kyis bstan zhing bslabs pa las /
T10D4202:176a-33: thog ma li yul byung nas dgung lo du lon
T10D4202:176a-34: pa ni goo to shan gyi mkhan po mo rgu
T10D4202:176a-35: de shing la sogs pa mkhan po bgres rims rnams
T10D4202:176a-36: kyis mkhan po snga rabs rnams la bka' mchid thos
T10D4202:176a-37: pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa dang /
T10D4202:176a-38: li rje'i rgyal rabs kyi yi ge dang zhib tu gtugs nas /
T10D4202:176a-39: gna' thog ma rgya gar yul du rgyal po ma
T10D4202:176a-40: skyes dgras rgyal po bgyis pa nas brtsis na rgyal
T10D4202:176a-41: po ma skyes dgras spyir dgung lo sum cu rtsa
T10D4202:176a-42: gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las /
T10D4202:176b-0: rgyal sred bzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las sangs rgyas mya ngan las @176b 'das ;
T10D4202:176b-1: de tshun chad dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te /
T10D4202:176b-2: rgyal po ma skyes dgra nas rgyal po dharma aa
T10D4202:176b-3: sho ka'i bar du rgya gar gyi rgyal po rabs
T10D4202:176b-5: dharma aa sho kas spyir rgyal po dgung lo lnga
T10D4202:176b-6: bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las rgyal por zhugs nas
T10D4202:176b-7: dgung lo sum cu lags pa'i 'og tu rgyal bu
T10D4202:176b-9: sa nu dgung lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe rgyal rje rgyal thabs btsal nas /
T10D4202:176b-10: thag ma skyes pa'i yul tshol sa tshol du mchis
T10D4202:176b-11: pa las rgyal pos nu dgung lo bcu dgu lon
T10D4202:176b-12: pa'i tshe li yul btsugs te /
T10D4202:176b-13: thog ma li rjer zhugs pa yan chad zhib tu
T10D4202:176b-14: brtsis nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung
T10D4202:176b-15: lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lags nas li
T10D4202:176b-17: rgyal bu sa nu thog mar li rjer zhugs nas rgyal srid bzung tshun chad dang /
T10D4202:176b-18: li rje btsan bzang btsan la brtan thog mar li
T10D4202:176b-19: rjer bskos nas li rje'i rabs lnga bcu rtsa drug
T10D4202:176b-20: dang / chag tshab cig byung ngo //
T10D4202:176b-21: gna' dang po mtsho bskams nas rgyal bu sa nu dang /
T10D4202:176b-22: blon po ya sha la sogs pas thog mar gzhi bzung ste yul btsugs /
T10D4202:176b-23: rgyal bus nu'i bu rgyal po ye'u la zhes bgyi
T10D4202:176b-24: bas 'u then gyi dngar ldan gyi grong khyer brtsigs
T10D4202:176b-25: te / li yul byung nas dgung lo brgya drug
T10D4202:176b-26: cu rtsa lnga 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal bu ye'u
T10D4202:176b-27: la'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sam bha ba
T10D4202:176b-28: zhes bgyi bas rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo lnga
T10D4202:176b-29: lags nas li yul du thog mar chos byung ste
T10D4202:176b-30: te / / 'jam dpal dang byams pa gnyis gyis
T10D4202:176b-31: li yul 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi khud
T10D4202:176b-32: pa lags par thugs su chud nas byams pa ni
T10D4202:176b-34: rgyal po bi dza ya sam bha ba zhes bya ba sprul /
T10D4202:176b-35: 'jam dpal ni dge slong 'phags pa bee ro tsa
T10D4202:176b-36: na'i gzugs su sprul nas las dang nyon mongs pa
T10D4202:176b-37: mthar phyin pa'i gnas yul tsar ma tsu le'i tshal
T10D4202:176b-38: du gshegs te / li yul na mchis pa'i sems
T10D4202:176b-39: can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing li
T10D4202:176b-40: skad kyang byis pa phyugs rdzi rnams la bcos shing
T10D4202:176b-41: du gshegs te / bstan / li'i yi ge yang bslabs nas de'i 'og tu chos byung ngo //
T10D4202:177a-0: de nas rgyal po ye'u la'i rgyal po bi @177a * //
T10D4202:177a-1: dza ya sam bha bas yon bdag bgyis nas dge
T10D4202:177a-2: ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bee ro tsa na'i slad
T10D4202:177a-3: du thog mar li yul du tsar ma'i gtsug lag
T10D4202:177a-4: khang chen po brtsig par bgyid pa las li rje
T10D4202:177a-5: bi dza ya sam bha ba'i blon po dang /
T10D4202:177a-6: 'bangs 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis kyang tsar mar
T10D4202:177a-7: gtsug lag khang re re brtsig par gsol nas brtsigs
T10D4202:177a-8: pa mang po zhig byung ba las rgyal pos bsams
T10D4202:177a-9: pa / gtsug lag khang brtsig tu ma stsal na ni bdag la dngos sdig tu 'gyur //
T10D4202:177a-10: de snyed cig brtsigs na ni slad kyis zhig ral
T10D4202:177a-11: du gyur na yang mi slongs su glo ba chung
T10D4202:177a-12: nas dge pa'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bee ro tsa
T10D4202:177a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sh'a ri ram su la bzhugs pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:177a-15: mchod rten rtsig shig ces bsgo na /
T10D4202:177a-16: sdig tu mi 'gyur ro zhes byung nas /
T10D4202:177a-17: rgyal pos kyang blon po dang 'bangs rnams la de
T10D4202:177a-18: bzhin du bsgo nas tsar mi'i gtsug lag khang chen
T10D4202:177a-19: po rgyal po bi dza ya sam bha bas brtsig
T10D4202:177a-20: pa'i tshe / rgyal po'i 'khor dang blon po dang
T10D4202:177a-21: 'bangs rnams kyi rtsar ma'i gtsug lag khang chung du
T10D4202:177a-22: pa'i tshe / dang / mchod rten brtsigs so 'tshal
T10D4202:177a-23: gyi nang na sh'a ri ram ma stsal ba cig
T10D4202:177a-25: gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa lags nas /
T10D4202:177a-26: 'phags pa bee ro tsa nas rgyal po bi dza
T10D4202:177a-27: ya sam bha ba la rgya po gand'i brdungs la
T10D4202:177a-28: 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang
T10D4202:177a-29: / rgyal po'i mchid nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
T10D4202:177a-30: sum du 'dir gshegs te bdag gi lag tu gand'i
T10D4202:177a-31: ma stsal gyi bar du bdag gand'i mi brdung ngo
T10D4202:177a-32: zhes smon lam btab pa dang /
T10D4202:177a-33: de ma thag tu 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge
T10D4202:177a-34: slong bee ro tsa nas nam mkha' la de bzhin
T10D4202:177a-36: nyan thos chen po bcu drug dang thabs cig tu
T10D4202:177a-37: tsar mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas rgyal
T10D4202:177a-38: po bi dza ya sam bha ba'i lag tu gand'i
T10D4202:177a-39: stsal nas ; rgyal pos gand'i brdungs pa dang dgung
T10D4202:177a-40: bdun gyi bar du gand'i de'i sgra ma chad par
T10D4202:177a-41: stsal nas ; byung ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T10D4202:177a-42: sprul pa mngon sum du gshegs pa'i dan rtags su
T10D4202:177a-43: gor ma la zhabs kyis bcags pa'i rjes da dung
T10D4202:177a-44: gi bar du tsar ma na mchis /
T10D4202:177a-45: 'phags pa nyan thos chen po bcu drug la mchod
T10D4202:177b-0: pa @177b rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i
T10D4202:177b-1: bshos cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba yang tsar
T10D4202:177b-2: ma'i gtsug khang gi nang du 'phags pa rnams kyis
T10D4202:177b-4: phyir dus dmas shing dge 'dun la yon bdag ma
T10D4202:177b-5: mchis te 'tsho ba mi 'byor ba'i dus na rin
T10D4202:177b-6: po che'i bshos cha de rnams de'i tshe sa'i 'og
T10D4202:177b-7: nas 'byung zhes 'phags pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung
T10D4202:177b-9: dge slong 'phags pa bee ro tsa na'i mchod pa'i
T10D4202:177b-10: rkyen du klu'i rgyal po hu lor zhes bgyi bas
T10D4202:177b-11: kha che'i yul nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi
T10D4202:177b-12: sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten cig spyan rangs nas
T10D4202:177b-13: nam mkha' las gshegs pa dang ltar tsar ma na
T10D4202:177b-14: bzhugs te / mchod rten 'di dri gtsang khang gi nang na bzhugs te /
T10D4202:177b-15: grib ma slad rol du gsal bar 'byung /
T10D4202:177b-16: rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba
T10D4202:177b-17: tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du
T10D4202:177b-18: mchis pa las sku gzugs lder so bgyis pa cig
T10D4202:177b-19: 'chag cig gshegs par mthong nas mtshams med pa lnga
T10D4202:177b-20: byang ngo zhes mchi ba yang da ltar bzhugs /
T10D4202:177b-21: gtsug lag khang de'i srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa yang /
T10D4202:177b-22: lhan nam mkha'i spyan dang nor bu bzang po zhes bgyi ba lags te /
T10D4202:177b-23: deng song gi bar du mngon rtags dang /
T10D4202:177b-25: 'phags pa'i lung bstan dag kyang sbyar na yang thog
T10D4202:177b-26: ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams brtsigs pa yang dge
T10D4202:177b-28: yon bdag 'phags pa sha stag gis mdzad la gtsug
T10D4202:177b-29: lag khang dang mchod rten bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang
T10D4202:177b-30: na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung
T10D4202:177b-31: dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T10D4202:177b-33: rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gnyan cing byin che rab ste /
T10D4202:177b-34: thog ma li yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba yang 'di las snga ba ma mchis so //
T10D4202:177b-35: de nas tsar mar 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge
T10D4202:177b-36: slong 'phags pa bee ro tsa nas chos phyung rgyal
T10D4202:177b-37: po bi dza ya sam bha bas gtsug lag khang
T10D4202:177b-38: brtsigs tshun chad rgyal po li rje rabs bdun gyi
T10D4202:177b-39: bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs /
T10D4202:177b-40: de nas de'i 'og tu rgya gar yul nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa buddha du ta dang /
T10D4202:177b-43: kha ga drod dang bzhi byung ste /
T10D4202:177b-44: goo to shan gyi a'arya sta nar bzhugs so //
T10D4202:178a-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byas pa yang li rje ba dzi @178a * //
T10D4202:178a-1: ya b'irya bya bar gyur te /
T10D4202:178a-2: rgyal po de srog mkhar gyi steng nas bltas nam khar gyi phyi rol na gser dang /
T10D4202:178a-3: dngul lta bur snang ba zhig mthong nas bsnyags pa dang /
T10D4202:178a-4: da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen bo bzhugs pa slebs nas bltas na /
T10D4202:178a-5: sha ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
T10D4202:178a-6: yang dag shes su gyur te rgyal po la smras
T10D4202:178a-7: pa / kye rgyal po khyod sangs rgyas kyis lung
T10D4202:178a-8: bstan pa bzhin 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa
T10D4202:178a-9: rigs so zhes bgyis pa dang /
T10D4202:178a-10: su'i phyir brtsigs zhes rgyal pos zhus pa dang /
T10D4202:178a-11: sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi pa 'phags pa
T10D4202:178a-12: dgra bcom pa buddha ta la sogs pa bzhi khyed
T10D4202:178a-13: kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'ongs pa 'di dag
T10D4202:178a-14: gi phyir brtsig ces bsgo ba dang /
T10D4202:178a-15: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal po
T10D4202:178a-16: bi dza ya b'irya'i drung du byon nas chos bshad
T10D4202:178a-17: pas rgyal po yang tshe snga ma'i smon lam dran
T10D4202:178a-18: nas de ma thag tu dogs brtag pa'i phur bu
T10D4202:178a-19: der btab ste / gtsug lag khang 'gum tir brtsigs so ;
T10D4202:178a-20: / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya b'irya 'gum
T10D4202:178a-21: tir gyi gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du
T10D4202:178a-22: mchis pa'i tshe bu chung ngu zhig stor nas rjes
T10D4202:178a-24: goo to shan gyi lung bu'i nang nas sangs rgyas
T10D4202:178a-25: 'od srungs kyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gyi
T10D4202:178a-27: de nas rgyal pos mchod rten 'di gang gi dus na sus brtsigs zhes smras pa dang /
T10D4202:178a-28: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa de dag gi zhal
T10D4202:178a-29: nas mchod rten 'di sangs rgyas 'od srungs mya ngan
T10D4202:178a-30: las 'das pa'i tshe brtsigs te sangs rgyas 'od srungs
T10D4202:178a-32: li yul sngon mtshor gyur ba'i dus na mchod rten 'di ris g-yogs te chus ma zhig la /

T10D4202:187b-41: gtsug lag khang 'bring du bgyi ba ni dgu bcu rtsa lnga lags /
T10D4202:187b-42: gtsug lag khang chung ngur bgyi ba ni brgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs /
T10D4202:187b-43: sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha khang chung du dang /
T10D4202:188a-2: mchod rten gyi sku mkhar gyi nang dang /
T10D4202:188a-3: slad rol gyi tshar yan chad na sum stong drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-4: 'u then na dge 'dun sgos 'tsho yan chad byi ba lo la brtsis na khri tsam zhig bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-5: mdo lo dang me skar phyogs na gtsug lag khang chen po ni bzhi zhig bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-6: sgo sgo'i lha khang dang yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha khang chung ngu ni brgya lhag tsam bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-8: kam shed dang pho nya dang /
T10D4202:188a-10: ao rgu yan chad ji la man chad sku mkhar gyi nang dang /
T10D4202:188a-11: slad rol gyi mtshar yan chad na gtsug lag khang chen po nyi shu rtsa gsum bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-12: gtsug lag khang 'bring ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-13: gtsug lag khang chung ngu nyi shu rtsa gsum tsam bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-14: sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha khang chung ngu dang chong
T10D4202:188a-15: rten chung ngu ni spyir brgyad brgya sum cu rtsa
T10D4202:188a-16: dgu bzhugs / dge 'dun sde gnyis las rkyen pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-17: sgo 'tsho yan chad sbyir bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-18: gyil kyang man chad kong sheng dang /
T10D4202:188a-19: durya yan chad sku mkhar gyi nang dang /
T10D4202:188a-20: slad rol gyi tshar yan chad na gtsug lag khang chen po bcom lnga tsam bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-21: sgo sgo'i lha khang chung du dang /
T10D4202:188a-22: yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha khang chung ngu dang /
T10D4202:188a-24: dge 'dun sde gnyis las rkyen pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-25: sgo 'tsho yan chad spyir dgu brgya drug cu rtsa gsum bzhugs /
T10D4202:188a-26: rgyal po sa nu'i tsha po rgyal po bi dza ya sam bha ba zhes bgyi ba'i tshe /
T10D4202:188a-27: thog ma li yul du chos byung ste brtsis na
T10D4202:188a-28: khyi lo'i shol bor ba'i ston zla tha chungs yan
T10D4202:188a-29: chad dgung lo stong nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug
T10D4202:188a-30: tsam lags / 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-31: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-32: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa rnams dang mthun par li'i yul dang /
T10D4202:188a-33: der li rje'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs nas /
T10D4202:188a-34: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-35: de'i gzhi gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4202:188a-37: mchod rten rnams ji ltar bzhengs pa dang /
T10D4202:188a-38: dge 'dun sde gnyis ji ltar spel ba'i tshul rgyas
T10D4202:188a-39: bar bstan pa li yul lung bstan pa zhes bya
